casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Julian David BROOKS, Appellant. No. 9009. United States Court of Appeals Fourth Circuit. Argued Jan. 7, 1964. Decided Jan. 9, 1964. Michael G. Plumides, Charlotte, N. C. (Plumides & Plumides, Charlotte, N. C., on brief), for appellant. William H. Murdock, U. S. Atty. (Roy G. Hall, Jr., Asst. U. S. Atty., on brief), for appellee.

Before HAYNSWORTH and BORE-MAN, Circuit Judges, and HUTCHESON, District Judge.

PER CURIAM:

Affirmed on the opinion of the District Court. United States v. Brooks, 221 F. Supp. 852.

Affirmed.
